replies.body: What champions or role do you play when you don't get to play adc ?
adc or feed

> [{quoted}](name=Danklight Vayne,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yfAdxBjB,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-10-10T05:54:14.513+0000)
>
> adc or feed

lol you could have just went Vayne or Quinn top instead of adc. Although you will need a tank jungler if you do this or just go tank vayne with a bork.  Haha i like that answer though :P

i have played ashe top and vayne top once each, won both games.
Played ashe support recently, lost however. 

When i get in champ select i let people know my account only plays 3 champions and link my op.gg. 
When they see my kda with champs that arent those 3 champs, they give me ad or im stuck with supp ashe lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Danklight Vayne,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yfAdxBjB,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-10T12:36:09.276+0000)
>
> i have played ashe top and vayne top once each, won both games.
> Played ashe support recently, lost however. 
> 
> When i get in champ select i let people know my account only plays 3 champions and link my op.gg. 
> When they see my kda with champs that arent those 3 champs, they give me ad or im stuck with supp ashe lol.

Anyway how Vayne works in the current top lane meta ? is she good against the juggernauts ?

Of-course she is good against the juggernauts, but the problem is laning and lock on CC, short range really bones her. I believe you need a good support but Gosu/Dlift might say otherwise. I mean you don't need a good support to be able to peel for yourself in teamfights, but to get through laning on top/ahead. it's a bit hard. If all lanes feed it's also hard to do anything that game.

Hi :)
What other ADC's do you like to play?
Which do you hate to lane against?
What sort of CS do you aim to get by 10 minutes? I know it's "just 10-20 more than my opponent", but what do you **aim** for?
If you had to change anything (other than remove juggernauts) what would you do?

Thanks for the AMA :)

Hi :):
 Hi ^.>

What other ADC's do you like to play?: 
Jinxu, Vayne

Which do you hate to lane against?:
 Graves, blitzcrank, thresh, annie, brand

What sort of CS do you aim to get by 10 minutes? I know it's "just 10-20 more than my opponent", but what do you aim for?:
 i focus on the 20minutes mark, 140+

If you had to change anything (other than remove juggernauts) what would you do?: 
Remove crit

Thanks for the AMA :)
You're welcome.
Also, what are your thoughts on Quinn as an ADC, and do you think she'll ever be viable?

Complete garbage.. Her kit is ok, minus the bird form. I believe she is viable if you DONT use her bird form in teamfights, but her auto attacks are just as powerful as other adcs, and other adcs have ults that are useful.
just ate like 10 sliced blocks of cheese with tomato sauce on it AMA

Yo' is it alright for you to whisper sweet nothings to everyone in gd chat for a solid 50 hours.

depends, when you say "you" do you mean *ME* or do you mean a general you as in everyone? 

if it's a *ME* "You" then yes it's fine
if it's an *EVERYONE* "You" no spastic pls.
